trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that supports distributed transactions and secure, reliable sessions.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> is similar to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> but provides more Web service features.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> es similar a la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> pero proporciona más características de servicios Web.

trans-unit.source: It uses the HTTP transport and provides message security, as does <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>, but it also provides transactions, reliable messaging, and WS-Addressing, either enabled by default or available through a single control setting.
trans-unit.target: Utiliza el transporte HTTP y proporciona seguridad para mensajes, como <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>, pero también proporciona transacciones, mensajería confiable y WS-Addressing, habilitada de forma predeterminada o disponible mediante un valor de control único.

trans-unit.source: The following sample code shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> class.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente código de muestra, se muestra cómo utilizar la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding" /> class.
The following sample code shows how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> class.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente código de muestra se muestra cómo inicializar una nueva instancia de la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.

trans-unit.source: The value of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode" /> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding" /> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> class with a `securityMode` parameter.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo inicializar una nueva instancia de la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> con un parámetro `securityMode`.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding" /> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> class with a string argument.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo de muestra se muestra cómo inicializar una nueva instancia de la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> con un argumento de cadena.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name <paramref name="configName" /> was not found.
The value of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode" /> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
<see langword="true" /> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding" /> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> class with a `securityMode` and `reliableSessionEnabled` parameter.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo inicializar una nueva instancia de la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> con un parámetro `securityMode` y `reliableSessionEnabled`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the WCF client will automatically store and resend any cookies sent by a single web service.
<see langword="True" /> if automatic cookies processing is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> Si las cookies automática de procesamiento es necesario; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.AllowCookies%2A> to `true` is useful when a client is interacting with one web service that uses cookies.
trans-unit.target: Establecer <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.AllowCookies%2A> a `true` es útil cuando un cliente interactúe con un servicio web que usa cookies.

trans-unit.source: If you are accessing multiple services with the same cookie, set <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.AllowCookies%2A> to `false` and you will have to manually add the cookie header to each outgoing message.
trans-unit.target: Si se obtiene acceso a varios servicios con la misma cookie, establezca <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.AllowCookies%2A> a `false` y tendrá que agregar manualmente el encabezado de cookie para todos los mensajes salientes.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to do this:
trans-unit.target: El código siguiente muestra cómo hacerlo:

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the channel factory produces.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de canal que produce el generador de canales.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the requirements for the channel factory built.
Builds the channel factory stack on the client that creates a specified type of channel and that satisfies the features specified by a collection of binding parameters.
An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1" /> of type TChannel that satisfies the features specified by the collection.
Returns an ordered collection of binding elements contained in the current binding.

The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection" /> that contains the ordered stack of binding elements described by the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding" /> binding.
The order of the binding elements is important.
trans-unit.target: El orden de los elementos de enlace es importante.

trans-unit.source: It reflects the order in which the protocol and transport channels are constructed and stacked.
trans-unit.target: Refleja el orden en que el protocolo y los canales de transporte se construyen y apilan.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> that contains the ordered stack of binding elements described by <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> binding.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo muestra cómo obtener la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> que contiene la pila ordenada de elementos de enlace descritos por el enlace <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.

trans-unit.source: The transport security mode set cannot provide the reliable session that has been enabled.
Returns the security binding element from the current binding.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> from the current binding.
Returns the transport binding element from the current binding.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> from the current binding.
Gets the security settings used with this binding.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity" /> that is used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity" /> que se usa con este enlace.

trans-unit.source: The default value <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode" /> property is <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode" /> es <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message" />.

trans-unit.source: To use something other than the default security type, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar un tipo de seguridad distinto del predeterminado, utilice el constructor <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode%29>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo obtener el valor de propiedad de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security" /> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
